Welcome to Calm Senzes

Hi, I'm a creator specializing in making relaxing nature sounds and also calming music, with a focus on rain and natural ambiances that help you unwind and sleep well. On this channel, you'll find soothing soundscapes designed to bring peace and tranquility to your everyday life.

Content Made by; 

IPhone 15/MacBook Pro
Adobe After Effects: Enhancing and editing the visuals 
CapCut : Editing
DALL-E: Generating beautiful and serene nature scenes.

Subscribe to enjoy the serene beauty of nature's music. 🌧️🌿
